alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 08 at 2:09PM PST until March 09 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM PST THURSDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start at the valley floors rising to 5000 feet by Thursday evening. These may drop back to nearly 4000 feet on Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
